summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no information available about Kevin Walsh. The documents primarily concern the payroll records of the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). They detail the names of employees, their social security numbers, annual salaries, and gross pay. The Assassination Records Review Board made a Final Determination Notification to postpone the release of Social Security numbers from the HSCA staff payroll records to protect personal privacy. Kevin Walsh is not mentioned in any of the document summaries.
significance: Based on the provided documents, the significance of Kevin Walsh in the JFK context cannot be determined as he is not mentioned.
